author: Justin Elliott
description: Given the slug of aromatic bitters in the recipe, it's not surprising that this riff on a Negroni packs a whack of bitters. However, that whack is subtler and a good deal more enjoyable than you might anticipate.
name: Tradewinds Negroni
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Angostura or other aromatic bitters

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)
